name: hello-react-counter
description: Taqyon example: Qt/C++ backend + React/TS frontend

scripts.app:run: if [ -f src-taqyon/build/bin/hello-react-counter ]; then cd src-taqyon/build/bin && ./hello-react-counter; else echo 'Application executable not found. Make sure to build successfully first.'; fi
scripts.app:run:verbose: if [ -f src-taqyon/build/bin/hello-react-counter ]; then cd src-taqyon/build/bin && ./hello-react-counter --verbose; else echo 'Application executable not found. Make sure to build successfully first.'; fi
scripts.app:run:dev: if [ -f src-taqyon/build/bin/hello-react-counter ]; then cd src-taqyon/build/bin && ./hello-react-counter --dev-server http://127.0.0.1:5173 --verbose; else echo 'Application executable not found. Make sure to build successfully first.'; fi
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run app:build
scripts.start: npm run build && ABSOLUTE_PATH="$(pwd)/src/dist" && if [ -f src-taqyon/build/bin/hello-react-counter ]; then cd src-taqyon/build/bin && ./hello-react-counter --verbose --frontend-path "$ABSOLUTE_PATH"; else echo 'Application executable not found. Make sure to build successfully first.'; fi
